title: Archive.org typesetting films
content:
I just found these films at archive org:

[Learning to set type (1959)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013203905/http:/www.archive.org/details/Learning1959)  
 [Typesetting: Linotype (Part I) (ca. 1960)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013203905/http:/www.archive.org/details/Typesett1960)  
 [Typesetting: Linotype (Part II) (ca. 1960)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013203905/http:/www.archive.org/details/Typesett1960_2)  
 [Printing (1947)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013203905/http:/www.archive.org/details/Printing1947)

These links may have been posted here already ages ago, but couldn't find anything with search so I thought posting them here was the right thing to do.
author: Jan Sandvik
